#summary BadVPN and NCD installation

= Gentoo =

A portage overlay is available on the Downloads page. The BadVPN package is `net-misc/badvpn`.

If you use Portage, manually unpack the overlay somewhere, and add this folder to PORTDIR_OVERLAY. Or, if you know how to, set up `layman` to fetch the overlay automatically.

If however you use Paludis, use something like this for `/etc/paludis/repositories/badvpn.conf`:
{{{
location = /var/paludis/repositories/badvpn
sync = tar+http://badvpn.googlecode.com/files/overlay-badvpn.tar.bz2
format = e
names_cache = /var/cache/paludis/names
write_cache = /var/cache/paludis/metadata
}}}
Then sync with `cave sync x-badvpn`.

= Arch =

Use the `badvpn` package from AUR: https://aur.archlinux.org/packages.php?ID=48249

= Ubuntu =

BadVPN builds are available in this PPA: https://launchpad.net/~ambrop7/+archive/badvpn/+packages

To install BadVPN from this PPA, run as root:
{{{
add-apt-repository ppa:ambrop7/badvpn
apt-get update
apt-get install badvpn
}}}
